title: Can not log in
body:
I played ranked game and has dc in middle of teamfight!!
WTF, now i cant log in back and even when i tried to repair game it doesnt help! GUYS HALP!

replies.body: Can you offer more detailed specifics on what behavior you saw prior to disconnecting from the match? Also any information on error codes you may have seen when disconnecting or when you weren't able to login could help too. With this info, I'll be able to offer you some steps to take in order to solve this. Thanks
